mapper.select: select * from nd_news order by news_level desc,news_index desc,news_createdTime desc limit #{start},#{end}
select news_id,news_title,news_content,news_createdTime from nd_news order by news_level desc,news_index desc,news_createdTime desc limit 0,1
select news_id,news_title,news_content,news_createdTime from nd_news order by news_level desc,news_index desc,news_createdTime desc limit 1,3
select f.firms_name from nd_news n join mid_news_firms mnf on n.news_id = mnf.news_id join nd_firms f on mnf.firm_id=f.firms_id where n.news_id=#{newsId} and n.news_type=2

select (num1+num2+num3) from (select count(*)as num1 from nd_news where news_level >(select news_level from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId})) as a, (select count(*)as num2 from nd_news where news_level=(select news_level from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId}) and news_index >(select news_index from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId}))as b, (select count(*)as num3 from nd_news where news_level=(select news_level from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId}) and news_index = (select news_index from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId}) and news_createdTime >(select news_createdTime from nd_news where news_id=#{newsId}))as c
select * from nd_news order by news_level desc,news_index desc,news_createdTime desc limit #{index},1
mapper.update: update nd_news set news_status=2 where news_id=#{newsId}
